"create table a(abcd)"
{
  "Action": "create"
}

"drop  table b"
{
  "Action": "drop"
}

"drop table b.c"
{
  "Action": "drop"
}

"alter table c alter foo"
{
  "Action": "alter"
}

"alter table c comment 'aa'"
{
  "Action": "alter"
}

"alter table b.c comment 'aa'"
{
  "Action": "alter"
}

"drop index a on b"
{
  "Action": "alter"
}

"drop index a on b.c"
{
  "Action": "alter"
}

"drop index a on b lock=none"
{
  "Action": "alter"
}

"rename table a to b"
{
  "Action": "rename"
}

"rename table c.a to c.b"
{
  "Action": "rename"
}

"alter table a rename b"
{
  "Action": "rename"
}

"alter table a rename to b"
{
  "Action": "rename"
}

"alter table c.a rename to c.b"
{
  "Action": "rename"
}

"create view a asdasd"
{
  "Action": "create"
}

"alter view c as foo"
{
  "Action": "alter"
}

"drop  view b"
{
  "Action": "drop"
}

"select * from a"
{
  "Action": ""
}

"syntax error"
{
  "Action": ""
}

"alter table a reorganize partition b into (partition c values less than (1000), partition d values less than (maxvalue))"
{
  "Action": "alter"
}

"alter table a partition by range (id) (partition p0 values less than (10), partition p1 values less than (maxvalue))"
{
  "Action": "alter"
}

# truncate
"truncate a"
{
  "PlanID": "DDL",
  "TableName": "a"
}

# truncate
"truncate table a"
{
  "PlanID": "DDL",
  "TableName": "a"
}
